name: Rush'n Attack
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Download the full version of Rush'n Attack and get all four levels of difficulty, plus a complete set of twelve achievements. So many POWs and so little time! Relive the Cold War from your warm cozy couch. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/LIVE/accounts.
